name: Dive Bomber (Pitman Publishing)
overview: Make Programming Your Commodore 64 a Game: Dive Bomber is a book that walks you through the creation of this game and goes over how to modify it and manipulate it to your tastes. In the game you control a plane flying above the city and can release only one bomb at a time to destroy the city as quickly and efficiently as possible and land the plane without crashing when done. You get extra points by being able to level the city in less than 40 runs.
